eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
    \frac{\partial }{\partial k}U'_{k}(\rho;T,\mu) &=&
    v_4 k \left(3U''_k+2\rho U'''_k\right)
      L^4_1\left( (U'_k+2\rho U''_k)/k^2;T\right)
     +3v_4\, k \,U''_k \,L^4_1\left(U'_k/k^2;T\right)
\nonumber \\
&&    +\frac{\partial^2 }{\partial k \partial \rho}      \left[ 
     {^4V}_{kF}(\rho)
     +{^3V}_{kF}(\rho;T,\mu)+{^3V}_{kF}(\rho;T,-\mu)
     \right] \, ,
    \label{eveq} \

\begin{eqnarray}
c_{k_T}&=&
\frac{\partial V_{k_T}}{\partial \delta} (0;T,\mu)
=\frac{\partial U_{k_T}}{\partial \sigma} (sigma_j;T,\mu)-j
\label{lthree} \\
ttilde{v}'_{k_T}&=&\frac{1}{\sqrt{k_T^5T}}
\left( \frac{\partial^2 U_{k_T}}{\partial \sigma^2} (sigma_j;T,\mu)\, \delta
+\frac{1}{2}\frac{\partial^3 U_{k_T}}{\partial \sigma^3} (sigma_j;T,\mu)\, \delta^2
+\frac{1}{6}\frac{\partial^4 U_{k_T}}{\partial \sigma^4} (sigma_j;T,\mu)\, \delta^3
+ {\cal O}(\delta^4) \right)
\nonumber \\
&&
\label{lfour} \
